credit_line: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk and metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave
description: Three pieces of embroidered linen, with design arranged in narrow panels. Stylized flower heads on either side of straight vine, worked in red outlined in pink; in gold thread outlined in brown; and in green for stems. Panels separated by bands of white drawn work. Probably taken from trouser legs.
name: Textile
